snippet: The San Francisco Symphony performed a piece by the 26-year-old new-music composer Samuel Carl Adams as well as a rendition of Mahler’s Fifth Symphony.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert of works, including the West Coast premiere of orchestral work Drift and Providence by new-music composer Samuel Carl Adams, performed by the San Francisco Symphony at Davies Symphony Hall.
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Symphony performed a piece by the 26-year-old new-music composer Samuel Carl Adams as well as a rendition of Mahler’s Fifth Symphony.

headline.seo: San Francisco Symphony Plays Mahler and Samuel Carl Adams
headline.main: Orchestra and Laptop on a Voyage of Discovery
headline.print_headline: Orchestra and Laptop on a Voyage of Discovery
